name: Putt! Championship Edition
overview:
For those looking for a more complete putting experience that goes beyond a cup on the floor, Putt! Championship Edition by Chicago Gaming brings an entertaining putting experience to your man cave.

Players use a real putter and golf ball as the “controller” in this game, knocking the ball into the sensor area underneath the video screen. Those sensors will appropriately measure the speed and angle of the ball and translate that movement instantly onto the 32″ HD display. The game itself features three nine hole courses, equaling 18 holes of challenging and competitive miniature golf play.

Putt! Championship Edition also features up to 4-player action, which encourages friendly competition between friends and families of all ages. Secret short cuts are also placed throughout the game and are designed to help improve players’ scores and promote repeat play.
